keyMoments.title: Kamakiri's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Kamakiri is first seen observing Aisa sneaking back into the Shandia village after gathering Vearth.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the strongest Shandia warriors who serves as a key fighter in the rebellion against Enel.

keyMoments.title: Shandian Warriors Council
keyMoments.description: Kamakiri participates in the council meeting with Wyper and other warriors, discussing their strategy regarding Gan Fall's appearance at Upper Yard.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Kamakiri as one of Wyper's trusted warriors and part of the Shandian leadership.

abilities.description: A spear technique using a heated blade.
Skilled at piloting Jet Boards for aerial combat and transportation.

relationships.description: Kamakiri serves under Wyper as one of his most trusted warriors in the fight to reclaim Upper Yard.

evolutionMoments.description: Kamakiri participates in the council meeting led by Wyper.

relationships.description: Kamakiri is good friends with Raki, acting kinder than other warriors.
Kamakiri is friends with Aisa and watches out for her.

evolutionMoments.description: Kamakiri observes Aisa sneaking back into the village.

reveals.information: Member of the Shandia warriors fighting to reclaim Upper Yard
One of the strongest Shandia warriors under Wyper

keyMoments.title: Raki's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Raki participates in the Shandian warriors council and attempts to reason with Wyper about Gan Fall potentially not being their enemy.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Raki as a more moderate voice among the Shandian warriors, contrasting with Wyper's hardline stance.
keyMoments.quote: Gan Fall may not be our enemy in the traditional sense...

keyMoments.title: Raki's Ideological Conflict with Wyper
keyMoments.description: Raki tries to present a more nuanced view of the conflict, but Wyper rejects her reasoning as something that will get in the way.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the internal dynamics and different perspectives within the Shandian faction.

abilities.description: Uses a rifle as primary weapon in combat.
Proficient with Jet Skis for aerial transportation.

relationships.description: Raki serves alongside Wyper but sometimes disagrees with his extreme methods, showing a more moderate perspective.

evolutionMoments.description: Raki attempts to reason with Wyper about Gan Fall, showing ideological differences.

relationships.description: Friends with Kamakiri, one of the other Shandian warriors.
Close friendship with Aisa, comparable to an older/younger sister dynamic.

reveals.information: A brave, kind-hearted warrior who presents a more moderate viewpoint compared to Wyper's extremism

keyMoments.title: Braham's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Braham participates in the Shandian warriors council meeting discussing strategy regarding the conflict in Upper Yard.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces another key Shandian warrior who will fight against Enel's forces.

abilities.description: Specializes in gunslinging using flash guns equipped with flash dials that obscure visibility when firing.
Demonstrates proficiency with jet skis for aerial combat.

relationships.description: Serves under Wyper as one of the Shandian warriors fighting to reclaim their homeland.

evolutionMoments.description: Braham participates in Wyper's council meeting.

reveals.information: Gunslinger specialist among the Shandian forces

keyMoments.title: Genbo's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Genbo participates in the Shandian warriors council meeting with Wyper and the other warriors.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces another Shandian warrior who fights alongside Wyper to reclaim Upper Yard.

abilities.description: Wields a bazooka that fires iron cannonballs, unusual for Sky Islands.
Can pilot Jet Skis for aerial navigation like other Shandia.

relationships.description: Serves under Wyper as one of the Shandian warriors.

evolutionMoments.description: Genbo participates in Wyper's council meeting.

reveals.information: A respected warrior who is not very talkative and takes combat seriously
